translation.landingPageDescription: Experience state-of-the-art equipment, expert trainers, and personalized programs designed to help you reach your goals.
translation.strengthDescription: Our gym focuses on building strength with a variety of free weights, resistance machines, and specialized classes. Our trainers guide you through proper techniques to ensure effective and safe workouts. Join our Powerlifting and Bodybuilding sessions to push your limits and achieve new personal bests in a supportive environment.
translation.bodyShapeDescription: We offer personalized training sessions and classes to help you achieve your desired body shape. Our equipment and expert trainers support your goals, whether it's slimming down, building muscle, or achieving a balanced physique. Get customized workout plans and nutrition tips to enhance your progress.
translation.conditionDescription: Improving your overall physical condition is a priority at our gym. We offer diverse classes like Yoga, Pilates, and HIIT to boost cardiovascular health, flexibility, and stamina. Our trainers help you maintain optimal health with balanced routines and proper recovery techniques for a healthier lifestyle. Additionally, we organize workshops on healthy living and proper nutrition.
translation.passwordPatternIsInvalid: 8+ chars, lowercase, uppercase, digit, special char
translation.pageNotFoundDesc: It looks like this site has taken a gym break.
translation.userIsNotAdult: You have to be 18 years old at least
translation.agreement: By creating an account on our gym web portal, you agree to the following
translation.forgotPasswordInfo: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
translation.passwordResetRequestHasBeenSent: Password reset request has been sent. Check your email box.
translation.passwordHasBeenChanged: Password has been changed. We'll redirect you to the sign-in page in a moment.
